name: Azurael's Circle: The Complete Book
description:
Azurael's Circle is a horror-mystery adventure series. Navigate the various chapters and find clues to piece together the mystery of Azurael and his circle. Use the various items you find and combined with your own cunning, discover the truth.

This collection contains all five chapters of Azurael's Circle so you can now buy the complete series at a discount in one bundle.

__________

Controls:

  • Z is Interact
  • X is Open Menu/Back
  • Arrow Keys is Movement
